definition: A unit of measurement typically used to estimate the time it takes to walk from one place to another. It is commonly employed when discussing distances within a city or between nearby locations.

examples.german: Die Wohnung ist nur f√ºnf Gehminuten vom Bahnhof entfernt.
examples.english: The apartment is only a five-minute walk from the train station.

examples.german: Das Hotel liegt in Gehminuten zum Stadtzentrum.
examples.english: The hotel is located within walking distance to the city center.

examples.german: Der Park ist nur wenige Gehminuten von hier entfernt.
examples.english: The park is only a few minutes' walk from here.

examples.german: Die Schule ist in zehn Gehminuten erreichbar.
examples.english: The school is reachable in ten minutes on foot.

examples.german: Der Supermarkt ist nur zwei Gehminuten entfernt.
examples.english: The supermarket is only a two-minute walk away.
